title: You and your pets will enjoy life at Lofts at Farmers Market! Pet friendly!
neighborhood: St. Paul - Downtown Lowertown Historic District
posting_body: ['Lofts at Farmers Market', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1182 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $2305', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', 'For a spectacular move-in ready Saint Paul, MN apartment to rent, come and visit us at the Lofts at Farmers Market!', 'Like all Weidner Apartment Homes, we pride ourselves on our unparalleled customer service and the pristine care with which we manage our communities.', 'Contact us today to learn about apartment availability, lease agreements, or to schedule a tour.', 'Come and find out what makes the Lofts so special!', 'Community Amenities', '◾ Coffee Bar', '◾ Furnished Units Available', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Onsite Management', '◾ Outdoor Grill', '◾ Pet Friendly', '◾ Pet Washing Station', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Social Events', '◾ Storage Space', '◾ Barbecue/Grill Area', '◾ Bike Repair Stations', '◾ Community-Wide WiFi', '◾ Controlled Access Building', '◾ Dry Cleaning Service Available', '◾ Kingsley Excellence Award', '◾ Pet Washing Station', '◾ Planned Social Activities', '◾ Reservable Clubhouse', '◾ Resident Lounge/ Clubroom', 'Unit Features', '◾ Double Pane Windows', '◾ High Ceilings', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Kitchen Island', '◾ Microwave', '◾ Open Floorplan', '◾ Pantry*', 'In Select Homes', '◾ Patio/Balcony*', 'In Select Homes', '◾ Washer/Dryer Full Size in Every Home', '◾ Window Coverings', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '260 5th St E', 'St. Paul, MN 55101', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dogs and cats welcome: Max. 2 allowed per home, deposit $200, one-time fee $200, monthly rent $40.', 'No weight limit, breed restrictions apply.', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Management Company:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'Please note pricing and availability subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A4D100A321A94D7']
